mapper.insert: insert into t_field_types(id, field_t01, field_t02, field_t03, field_t04, field_t05, field_t06, field_t07, field_t08, field_t09, status, field_01, field_02, field_03, field_04, field_05) values ( #{id}, #{fieldT01}, #{fieldT02}, #{fieldT03}, #{fieldT04}, #{fieldT05}, #{fieldT06}, #{fieldT07}, #{fieldT08}, #{fieldT09}, #{status}, #{field01}, #{field02}, #{field03}, #{field04}, #{field05} )
mapper.update: update t_field_types set field_t01 = #{fieldT01}, field_t02 = #{fieldT02}, field_t03 = #{fieldT03}, field_t04 = #{fieldT04}, field_t05 = #{fieldT05}, field_t06 = #{fieldT06}, field_t07 = #{fieldT07}, field_t08 = #{fieldT08}, field_t09 = #{fieldT09}, status = #{status}, field_01 = #{field01}, field_02 = #{field02}, field_03 = #{field03}, field_04 = #{field04}, field_05 = #{field05}, version = version + 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id as id, field_t01 as fieldT01, field_t02 as fieldT02, field_t03 as fieldT03, field_t04 as fieldT04, field_t05 as fieldT05, field_t06 as fieldT06, field_t07 as fieldT07, field_t08 as fieldT08, field_t09 as fieldT09, version as version, status as status, field_01 as field01, field_02 as field02, field_03 as field03, field_04 as field04, field_05 as field05 from t_field_types where id = #{id}
select version from t_field_types where id = #{id}

select id as id, field_t01 as fieldT01, field_t02 as fieldT02, field_t03 as fieldT03, field_t04 as fieldT04, field_t05 as fieldT05, field_t06 as fieldT06, field_t07 as fieldT07, field_t08 as fieldT08, field_t09 as fieldT09, version as version, status as status, field_01 as field01, field_02 as field02, field_03 as field03, field_04 as field04, field_05 as field05 from t_field_types

select id as id, field_t01 as fieldT01, field_t02 as fieldT02, field_t03 as fieldT03, field_t04 as fieldT04, field_t05 as fieldT05, field_t06 as fieldT06, field_t07 as fieldT07, field_t08 as fieldT08, field_t09 as fieldT09, version as version, status as status, field_01 as field01, field_02 as field02, field_03 as field03, field_04 as field04, field_05 as field05 from t_field_types limit #{pageSize} offset #{pageIndex}
